publicationStmt.publisher: Yoav Cohen and Maya Ben Tov, Ben-Gurion University

lg.l: Well I'm so sorry to say
It's all been said before
So let the music be the key
To unlock your heart's door
Monkeys do what monkeys see
The jezuz fish man did it first
We all draw from the same spring
Just to satisfy our thirst
You're a cosmos to yourself
With no place left to go
So you stargaze in the lights
Of another cheap rock show
The 1's and 0's in your mind
Drive you virtually mad
Adult dreams of childhood fun
The best times you've ever had
SIReality, plug us into your matrix, dominate
SIReality, our brain is tired; won't you think for us again
And be for us a loyal friend
Please think for us again, and be for us a friend
